category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 28 (Request for disciplinary action)
contents: Article 28 (Request for disciplinary action) ① The Sports Council may determine the person suspected of disciplinary action and the level of disciplinary action and request disciplinary action from the relevant organization. However, if the target is a person under Article 25 (2), the committee will discipline him or her. Revised December 20, 2019. ② Pursuant to Paragraph 1, if there are sufficient grounds for disciplinary action from the sports committee or city/provincial committee, the Sports Council must immediately request disciplinary action and report the results of the disciplinary action to the Sports Council within 3 months from the date of request for disciplinary action. Failure to report may result in direct disciplinary action.
